title: Romantic Porno
sinopse:
You... You want to do what!?

While drowning their sorrows together after being dumped by their respective girlfriends, co-workers Mizuki Kayama and Ritsu Manabe somehow end up dating each other. The mild-mannered Mizuki believes that the most important part of a relationship is making your partner happy, while to Ritsu, love and enthusiastic sex go hand-in-hand. Will Mizuki be able to keep his lover's voracious sexual appetite satisfied, or will their relationship end as quickly as it began?

(Source: MU)
